title: TNPSC Group 4 exam 2016: Results declared, check them here | education$career | Hindustan Times
text:
TNPSC Group 4 exam 2016: Results declared, check them here education Updated: Feb 22, 2017 09:27 IST Nilesh Mathur Hindustan Times, New Delhi The Tamil Nadu Public Service Commission (TNPSC) on Tuesday declared the results of the written examination held for direct recruitment to various Group-IV Services posts for the year 2015-2016. (Stock Photo) 
The Tamil Nadu Public Service Commission (TNPSC) declared on Tuesday the results of the written examination held for direct recruitment to various Group-IV Services posts for the year 2015-2016. The examination was held on November 6. 
Steps to check the results: 
1) Visit TNPSC’s official website. 
2) Enter ‘register number’ and click on submit 
3) Marks obtained by candidate and his rank position will be displayed on the screen 
4) Take a printout for future reference 
Or click here to directly go to the login page. 
The examination was of three hours’ duration and 300 marks. The minimum qualifying marks for selection is 90. Read more APSLPRB AP Police SI mains exam 2017: Answer keys released, raise objections now 
The notification for the examination (15/2016) was released on August 9, 2016, to fill 5,451 Group-IV Services posts. Out of the total vacancies, as many as 2,345 are for the post of junior assistant (non-security); 121 for junior assistant (security); eight for bill collector (grade I); 532 for field surveyor; 327 for draftsman; 1,714 for typist; and 404 for steno-typist (grade III). tags
